channel.title: Adding my shop
channel.description:
i read the [tut] on how but i dont get what it means .. it sais this ..
now save and close shops.cfg, then open up autospawn.cfg
type in the information for the npc that's going to be the owner of the shop. Put it under another shopkeeper. The id of the npc, the coords, the range for it to walk in, the walktype, and the name of it.
does it mean like this ??
so i added a mage store owner too..
is it supposed to look like this ??
spawn = 1834 3170 3176 0 0 0 0 0 1 Lumbridge Swamp Candle Seller spawn = 844 2681 3325 0 2686 3327 3318 2679 1 East Ardougne Essence Wizard spawn = 553 3253 3402 0 3255 3404 3250 3399 1 Varrock Aubury at Magic shop spawn = 522 3217 3416 0 3220 3420 3213 3411 1 Varrock General Store Shop Keeper spawn = 1658 3250 3430 0 0 0 0 0 2 robe shop owner in real
cuz wen i compile.. it comes up with errors on the compile.. then wen i log in it dcs straight away... [br][size=1]Posted at: September 03, 2006, 05:12:27 PM[/size][hr]help how to not get this error plz ??
error looks like this
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img478.imageshack.us/img478/6454/compilerlolwo9.png[/img][/URL]
i know if that thing at the bottom wasnt there.. it wud work

item.title: Adding my shop
item.dc:creator: @user123 user123
item.description:
@user123 wrote:

its supposed to look like this

spawn = 1834	3170	3176	0	0	0	0	0	1	Lumbridge Swamp Candle Seller
spawn = 844	2681	3325	0	2686	3327	3318	2679	1	East Ardougne Essence Wizard
spawn = 553	3253	3402	0	3255	3404	3250	3399   	1	Varrock Aubury at Magic shop
spawn = 522	3217	3416	0	3220	3420	3213	3411	1	Varrock General Store Shop Keeper
spawn = 1658	3250	3430	0	0	0	0	0	2	Robe Shop Owner In Real

if it doesnt work try chaniging te 2 to 1 and try changing ur cordinates

Read full topic

type in the information for the npc that’s going to be the owner of the shop. Put it under another shopkeeper. The id of the npc, the coords, the range for it to walk in, the walktype, and the name of it.
